if i were u i would wait till 6 and if ur still feelin off u really should go because it could just be the combination off tabs thats making u feel that way but it could also be ur illness (i hope its not) but i also no that iron tabs are ment 2 make u constapated not have the runs but plz plz plz think about going 2 A&E asap bcoz that does not sound gg alo i am glad the dizzyness has worn off ;) sit down with a STRONG SWEET cup ov tea that is ment 2 be gd for sickness but plz let me no how u get on and add me as friend if u like??? all the best hen

I believe that e-coli can cause quite a bit of intestinal problems, so it could be from that and the antibiotics haven't set in yet.  It could also be that you are sensitive to the antibiotics themselves, so I would be safe and call the doctor.  Iron pills usually make you constipated after taking them for a few days, and they can be hard on the stomach as well.

Protein in your urine is cause for concern.  That along with headache could be a signs of preeclampsia.  You NEED to call your doctor to make sure they know.

question: Hi ladies im  jst wondering if  this is normal  during preganacy  or not? im now 28 weeks and 4 days pregnant and lst week when i saw my midwife  i found out i had e-coli  in  my blood /urine and that i was anemic. not to mention having sugar , protien and nitrate in my urnine sample there and then. i was given  anti'b's to take for my iron level and infection. which i started takin  on  friday. since takin the  medication   i  have the runs on and off and started being sick. But now im getting a little concerned  because im also  starting to feel really  dizzy  and i keep getting headaches alot. so should i b worried or is this normal? i dont have any credit to ring my docs or midwife till friday so i really could do with some advise plz.
title: Urgent advise plz needed ladies!
